content: My suggestion would be contracting CATegory theory zuLIP to catlips, if only to see the look on peoples faces when I say it
The "official" name for this place has been the "Category theory community server".

But I'm not gonna insist on that. I do insist that it's about category theory, not just applied category theory. And I don't see why we need to call it something that contains the brand name "Zulip". That's just the underlying technology.

Would it be bad to call it the "category forum"? Are there other category forums?

Maybe we don't *need * to call it something containing "zulip", but that's the most natural thing for many people (including myself) to call it, because that's what it is. I have a much easier time remembering what "the category theory zulip" is than "the category theory community server".
I just drop the link and say "here".
